scripts.postinstall: cp ./bin/react.gradle ./node_modules/react-native && cp ./.helpers/react-addons-test-utils_index.js ./node_modules/react-addons-test-utils/index.js && cp ./.helpers/react-native-type-fix.index.d.ts ./node_modules/\@types/react-native/index.d.ts && cp .helpers/RCTImageCache.m ./node_modules/react-native/Libraries/Image/RCTImageCache.m && cp .helpers/RCTWebSocketExecutor.m node_modules/react-native/Libraries/WebSocket/ && cp .helpers/RCTTextField.m ./node_modules/react-native/Libraries/Text/ && cp .helpers/RCTTextView.m ./node_modules/react-native/Libraries/Text/
